name: RainingCrystals Chronicles
description:
RainingCrystals Chronicles is a "2.5D" Action Game, Where you play as 3 different characters through the main story.

Cuurian, A Girl with two Snake-like creatures instead of hands, is the chosen one to defeat Amatheria, Queen of the demons and save her planet and hopefully, planet Earth too. 

Cuurian has to team up with a lot of characters to achieve this goal. Enjoy a Fast-Paced, 2.5d Side scrolling action game with a lot of secrets and side missions!

Currently at Pre-Alpha Stage with few levels.
